content: 10 stitches to holder or scrap yarn and with working yarn cast on 2 stitches to right hand needle using backward loop cast-on remove marker knit to end 24 28 32 sts work hand knit every round for approximately 3 3 5 4 inches or 1 5 2 2 inches less than desired total length of hand decrease as follows round 1 *k1 ssk k6 8 10 k2tog k1 repeat from * to end 4 sts decreased round 2 knit round 3 *k1 ssk k4 6 8 k2tog k1 repeat from * to end 4 sts decreased round 4 knit round 5 *k1 ssk k2 4 6 k2tog k1 repeat from * to end 4 sts decreased round 6 *k1 ssk k0 2 4 k2tog k1 repeat from * to end 4 sts decreased 8 12 16 sts remain medium and large sizes only work next round round 7 *k1 ssk k0 2 k2tog k1 repeat from * to end 4 sts decreased 8 12 sts remain large size only work next round round 8 *k1 ssk k2tog k1 repeat to end 4 sts decreased 8 sts remain all sizes work the next round round 9 *ssk k2tog repeat from * to end 4 sts decreased 4 sts remain this pattern/design is the property of the author/designer it may not be reproduced without permission cut yarn and using a yarn needle draw yarn through remaining sts pull tight and fasten_off thumb slip stitches from stitch holder onto two double pointed needles with yarn and at the base of thumb on the fabric of hand use an empty needle to pick up and knit 6 6 6 stitches 12 14 16 sts place a removable stitch marker on fabric to mark the beginning of the round and join without twisting to work in the round knit approximately 1 5 2 2 5 inches or 5 inches less than desired total length of thumb decrease as follows first round *k2tog repeat from * to end 6 7 8 sts decreased second round k0 1 0 *k2tog repeat from * to end 3 3 4 sts decreased cut yarn and using a yarn needle draw yarn through remaining sts pull tight and fasten_off finishing weave in all ends block lightly as desired this pattern/design is the property of the author/designer it may not be reproduced without permission
